content.rendered:
Radix Solutions

At Tech Radix we focus on building the right solutions for the SMB segments. We love to discuss ideas big or small, nurture and give life to ideas of yours or ours. We employ business first approach and apply minimalist principles and philosophy to design and develop the JUST-RIGHT business solutions.

We are a next-gen tech company with entrepreneurial spirit, collaborative mindset and a caring heart. Our complete services across Application development, ERP customization, Startup Incubation and Biz-tech advisory offers a one stop solution for the SMB businesses.

Our Vision

Unlock the true power of technology for small to mid sized businesses. 

What We Offer

If you are a small to mid sized company wanting to accelerate your growth by leveraging digital technology, you have come to the right place. Or if you are an entrepreneur, solopreneur or a professional and starting up your business and looking for a partner, an ally or a support who can help maintain your focus on your business, your idea, you can definitely contact us.

We offer end to end services whether you want to road test and launch your business idea or operate and grow your business. We will fill the technology gap, address the business need, through our customized solution for you. We have technology expertise and software solutions, business knowledge and IT infrastructure and digital tools to help you in any phase of your business. We are not a typical outsourcing partner, we live, breathe and thrive on your idea and it matters to us as much as it does to you.

Below are some of the solutions and services we offer to help you establish and run your core business

Application Development

Using technology to drive business results by building the JUST-RIGHT solution for you, fast!

Web Development

Our experts have decades of experience building SaaS and cloud native applications. We combine our experience, expertise, latest technology and industry proven agile methodology to build high performing, scalable and responsive web apps…read more.

Mobile App Development

We have expertise building mobile applications across industry ranging from an app for a specific business use case like remote workers management to a complex online marketplace. We evaluate the right strategy to employ for delivering the best fitting mobile app..read more.

UI/UX Development

We have devised our UX practice based on user experience strategy and planning process that considers the goals of the business and the needs of the real consumers of the brand. We deliver UX to delight the end users…..read more.

Cloud and Devops

Our Cloud and DevOps solution help establish and run efficient development operations that can balance service reliability and delivery speed…..read more.

LCNC Development

We employ a business first approach to implement low-code applications for startups and enterprises alike. Our skilled and trained professionals, bundled solutions, process playbooks and dedicated attention helps us build business solutions which are meaningful, flexible, scalable and easy to maintain…read more.

Consulting services

We learnt, practiced and mastered doing business, establishing and running a team, a company. We learnt Finance, Marketing, Cloud, Technology and now use it to mentor, advise and help SMBs

ERP Services| Business Advisory | Learning & Development

ERP Services

Tech Radix ERP Solutions and Services excels in providing innovative cloud solutions that unify workflows and analytics across the value chain, from Customers to internal ops thereby empowering the modern executives and managers….read more.

Business Advisory

The startups and SMBs look out for mentorship, guidance and advice from industry experts to help them maneuver the volatile business scenarios. Especially during the early phases, the founding partners need to leverage advisors for a much deeper engagement and complementary skill sets….read more.

Learning & Development

There is huge shortage of IT talent in the industry right now. Ironically, on the other hand there are lot of young talented individuals who are looking out for for their first opportunity in this space. Most of such talented individuals are ignored by the industry because they are not groomed well, unskilled in right technology or have communication challenges. No one is willing to take the first step and give a break to such individuals, train them, mentor them so that they too can be ready for their professional journey. Our whole motive of embedding Learning at the core of our business is to provide that first break to the ignored community…..read more.

Radix Partnership Model

We have a partnership and delivery model that would suit anyone who believes in his business idea. you can count on us through out your journey from inception to prosperity.

BOT Model |  Project | SaaS Product & Platform| Partnership| Incubation Lab

Bot Model

We have over a decade of experience in setting up and running offshore development center using BOT (Build, Operate & Transfer) business model. It’s a hybrid option that offers US/UK/APAC based companies to acquire essential Software Delivery capabilities from India ….read more.

Incubation Lab

Startup and SMB ecosystem is growing at very fast pace, their business is evolving and changing briskly, thus requiring very specific solutions that can match with their growth and affordability. Tech companies, having an enterprise outlook, struggle to understand and enable the SMB space….read more.

 

Project

We have ready team and resources to work on your IT and development projects. Our key motive is to help you automate, build and launch a business solution in a way that works best for you…read more.

SaaS Product & Platform 

We have decades of expertise building, running and managing SaaS Products and solutions.  We are fully aware of the intricacies involved building, marketing and selling a SaaS solution…read more.

 

Idea factory

Innovation is one of the the core belief of our company and we not only encourage our colleagues and partners to nurture and work on their ideas but also greatly incentivise them.

Radix Field sense | Rx Camp |Radix HR Pay| Radix Sanchay App| Radix Marketplace

Market Place

The emerging or unstructured market segments like poultry, steel, gems and stones are highly fragmented and  inconsistent. There is a clear need to automate and connect the various players across demand, supply and logistics participants. The opportunity lies in providing a easy to use light weight B2B Marketplace geared towards specific segments…..read more.

Radix Field sense

Field sense is a business application meant to be used by any company in order to streamline their field operations. it captures the location information of the sales or marketing staff during their working hours….read more.

Rx Camp

Our simple, intuitive and flexible platform to set up a health camp. The solution is for various NGO’s, doctors, hospitals, healthcare providers and welfare communities to setup, launch and manage health camp….read more.

Radix HR Pay

HR Pay is a comprehensive web application based HR and Payroll software suitable for companies of all sizes.It covers all aspects of employee life cycle from Recruitment to Resignation…..read more.

Sanchay App

We at Tech Radix spend hours ensuring that the solution we deliver is well adopted by the end users. The latest “Sanchay” is a true testimony of how a simple solution can drive big changes to our society……read more.

Contact us

It’s very easy to get in touch with us. Just use the contact form or pay us a visit for a coffee at the office.

Head Office
104, Rituraj Business Center,
Bicholi Mardana, Indore, Madhya Pradesh 452016

  • Phone: +91 89 89 89 95 96
  • Email : info@tech-radix.com
